name: moreconference
overview:
moreconference provides private social networks for delegates at conferences and events.

Delegates use the service to get in touch before an event and stay in touch afterwards. Every delegate has their own profile and can post to a shared discussion board.

The unique features of moreconference are that the network is only open to delegates of the same event. The free version also provides integration with social media services and access to a mobile website.

The premium version allows conference organisers to add their own logos and branding to the site and moderate the discussion board and allows delegates to send direct messages to each other.
